37.name: Vaizel's Wisdom I
37.Description: Spell casting time decreased by 25% for 15s.

28.name: Zikel's Wisdom I
28.Description: Increases your Magic Boost by 300 for 15s.

20.name: Lumiel's Wisdom I
20.Description: For 15s, you can use skills with only 50% of the required MP.

28.name: Curse of Weakness I
28.Description: Curses a target within 25m. For 1 min, each time they use magical skills, they take magic damage equal to 5% of their Max HP. This damage will not exceed 500.

40.name: Curse of Weakness II
40.Description: Curses a target within 25m. For 1 min, each time they use magical skills, they take magic damage equal to 10% of their Max HP. This damage will not exceed 1000.

52.name: Curse of Weakness III
52.Description: Curses a target within 25m. For 1 min, each time they use magical skills, they take magic damage equal to 12% of their Max HP. This damage will not exceed 1200.

20.name: Curse of Roots I
20.Description: Transforms the target into a tree for 20s. The transformed target cannot move or act, and their All Elemental Defense increases. The effect ends if the target is attacked. The duration decreases if the target is a player.

52.name: Elemental Ward I
52.Description: Increases All Elemental Defense by 300 and Magic Resistance by 300 for 1m.

50.name: Flame Spray I
50.Description: Inflicts 3116 fire damage on a target within a 25m radius.

53.name: Flame Spray II
53.Description: Inflicts 3436 fire damage on a target within a 25m radius.

25.name: Ice Sheet I (A)
25.Description: Inflicts Magical Water Damage on up to 6 enemies within a selected area and reduces their Movement Speed for 20 seconds.

37.name: Ice Sheet II (A)
37.Description: Inflicts Magical Water Damage on up to 6 enemies within a selected area and reduces their Movement Speed for 20 seconds.

49.name: Ice Sheet III (A)
49.Description: Inflicts Magical Water Damage on up to 6 enemies within a selected area and reduces their Movement Speed for 20 seconds.

55.name: Ice Sheet IV (A)
55.Description: Inflicts Magical Water Damage on up to 6 enemies within a selected area and reduces their Movement Speed for 20 seconds.

25.name: Ice Sheet I (E)
25.Description: Inflicts Magical Water Damage on up to 6 enemies within a selected area and reduces their Movement Speed for 20 seconds.

37.name: Ice Sheet II (E)
37.Description: Inflicts Magical Water Damage on up to 6 enemies within a selected area and reduces their Movement Speed for 20 seconds.

49.name: Ice Sheet III (E)
49.Description: Deals Magical Water Damage to up to 6 enemies within a selected area of effect and reduces their Movement Speeds for 20 seconds.

55.name: Ice Sheet IV (E)
55.Description: Deals Magical Water Damage to up to 6 enemies within a selected area of effect and reduces their Movement Speeds for 20 seconds.

54.name: Exchange Vitality I
54.Description: Exchanges your current HP with your MP.

48.name: Barrier of Severance I
48.Description: Creates a shield that blocks 20000 damage for 8s each time the caster receives attack. The caster is stunned.

55.name: Wintry Armor I
55.Description: If an enemy within a 5m radius attacks you, you reflect 1000 damage to the enemy for 30s and slows its Movement Speed and Attack Speed for 2 sec.

44.name: Boon of Quickness I
44.Description: Reduces the casting time of all your magic skills by 50% for 15s.

44.name: Boon of Strength I
44.Description: Increases your Magic Boost by 500 and Magic Accuracy by 500 for 15s.

45.name: Illusion I
45.Description: Removes 1 physical debuff and allows the caster to evade 2 Physical Attacks for 10s.

45.Description: Inflicts 579 fire damage on up to 6 targets within a 10m radius. Targets are stunned for 4s.

50.name: Sleeping Storm I
50.Description: Forces a target within a 25m radius and up to 6 enemies within a 12m radius of the target to fall asleep for 20s and increases their All Elemental Defense. The duration decreases if the target is a player.
